ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates the performance of SciChart's XyScatterRenderableSeries by loading 1,000,000 scatter chart points.
ExampleDefinition.Description:
This demo showcases the loading or startup time of SciChart by appending one million points to a Scatter Chart and rendering at interactive framerates!
